title: OnePlus Nordâ€™s latest OxygenOS 12 Open Beta update fixes the audio playback bug
content:
Earlier this month, OnePlus released the first Open Beta of OxygenOS 12 for the OnePlus Nord, allowing users to try out an early version of Android 12 before the public release. As it’s usually the case with beta releases, the first beta build was a bit rough around the edges. OnePlus has issued a hotfix

The post OnePlus Nord’s latest OxygenOS 12 Open Beta update fixes the audio playback bug appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The OnePlus Nord is getting a new OxygenOS 12 Open Beta update that fixes an audio playback bug. Read on to know more.
